product_name: Marmot Bowls Flannel Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The soft, midweight Marmot Bowls Flannel shirt for men hides its performance hiking features behind a stylish look that fits in on the trail or around town. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking polyester flannel with a touch of wool gives you plenty of warmth without the weight. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Marmot Bowls Flannel shirt for men features flat seams for non-chafing comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The soft, midweight Marmot Bowls Flannel shirt for men hides its performance hiking features behind a stylish look that fits in on the trail or around town.
